front.title: Cryptographic Algorithms, Use, & Implementation Requirments for TCP Authentication Option

abstract.t: The TCP Authentication Option, TCP-AO, relies on security algorithmsto provide authentication between two end-points. There are manysuch algorithms available, and two TCP-AO systems cannot interoperateunless they are using the same algorithm(s). This document specifiesthe algorithms and attributes that can be used in TCP-AO's currentmanual keying mechanism.
